desc.p: Find the nearest geocaches. Results are sorted by the distance from a given center point.

req.name: center
req.p: The center point (typically - the user's location).

Use positive numbers for latitudes in the northern hemisphere and longitudes in the eastern hemisphere (and negative for southern and western hemispheres accordingly). These are full degrees with a dot as a decimal point (ex. "54.3|22.3").

opt.name: radius
opt.p: Maximal distance (from the center point) for the cache to be included in the results.

xml.other-params: You may also use all the "stadard filtering" arguments defined in the search/all method.

returns.p: Same format as in the search/all method.
